title: Short Video, Feedback helps!

embed.description: This time we get good and kill people. League of Legends is owned by Riot Games.

body: We took into account what you said last time and now we have cut out about 20 minutes from a new game in the hopes of bringing you something you can enjoy! We really do like making these and as always feedback always helps!

replies.body: Only problem i have with this, is the sound quality, and the mouse clicking..
